285  int, int, int, int,

302 // ------------- inline and template functions -----------------
303 
304  inline
305  BlockSparseMatrix &
306  BlockSparseMatrix::operator = (const double d)
307  {
308  Assert (d==0, ExcScalarAssignmentOnlyForZeroValue());
309 
310  for (size_type r=0; r<this->n_block_rows(); ++r)
311  for (size_type c=0; c<this->n_block_cols(); ++c)
312  this->block(r,c) = d;
313 
314  return *this;
315  }
316

325  }
